Started as a small survey school in 1794, College of Engineering, Guindy has now evolved into a sprawling space of technical eminence.
		Ever since its inception, the college has been a centre of academic and technical excellence.By the assiduous efforts of the students and the prolific works of the prominent alumni network, the college has rightly earned a place in the technical map of the world.
		With its strong ties with the top notch engineering and management industries, the college serves to be an excellent link between the students and the corporate world year after year.
